MULTIPLAYER_INIT.NO_PLAYERS: There is no player in this room.
MULTIPLAYER_INIT.CREATOR_GAME: The creator of the game is:
MULTIPLAYER_INIT.NO_ROOMS: Il n'y a pas de salle disponible.

GAME.TRYING_CONNECT: try to log in. Do you want to accept him in the game?
GAME.DO_YOU_WANT_QUIT:
Do you really want to leave this page?
That would be equivalent to abandoning the game!
GAME.PLACEHOLDER_CHAT: Write a command with ! or a message
GAME.NAME_NEW_ROOM: Name of the new chat room:
GAME.WAITING_FOR_CREATOR: Waiting for the creator to start the game...

SIDEBAR.TAKE_PLACE: Take the place of a virtual player
SIDEBAR.NO_POWERS: You have no power. To get one, you need to place
SIDEBAR.CLICK_PLAYER: Click on the player you want to exchange your stand with!
SIDEBAR.CLICK_ON_LETTER_EXCHANGE: Click on the letter you want to exchange:
SIDEBAR.CLICK_ON_LETTER_RESERVE: Click on the letter you want to take from the reserve:
SIDEBAR.ENTER_COORDINATES: Please enter the coordinates of the box to be changed:
SIDEBAR.GAME_FINISHED: The game is over, cannot give up anymore.
SIDEBAR.GIVE_UP_GAME_QUESTION: Do you really want to quit the game?
SIDEBAR.INVALID_COORDINATES: Invalid coordinates. The format must be (row-column). Example: e10
SIDEBAR.NOT_EMPTY_TILE: This box is not empty. Please choose another box.
SIDEBAR.NOT_EMPTY_BONUS_TILE: This box already has a bonus. Please choose another box.

RESULT.CREATOR: Room creator:
RESULT.NAME: Name:
RESULT.NUMBER_OF_LETTERS_LEFT: Number of letters remaining in the reserve:
RESULT.ADD_GAME_FAVORITE_QUESTION: Add this game to your favorites ?
RESULT.NUMBER_TURNS_IN_GAME: Number of turns played in the game:
RESULT.UPDATE_FAVOURITES_MESSAGE: The game has been added into your favourites

LOGIN_PAGE.MIN_USERNAME: Username must be at least 3 characters
LOGIN_PAGE.MAX_USERNAME: Username must be at most 20 characters
LOGIN_PAGE.VALID_EMAIL: Email must be a valid email address
LOGIN_PAGE.MIN_PASSWORD: Password must be at least 6 characters
LOGIN_PAGE.ALREADY_ACCOUNT: If you already have an account, click the sign-in button:
LOGIN_PAGE.NO_ACCOUNT: If you don't have an account, click the sign-up button:

POWERS.Cette carte permet de faire sauter le to: This card skips the next player's turn.
POWERS.Cette carte permet de transformer une tu: This card allows you to transform an empty tile into a bonus space of random color.
POWERS.Cette carte permet de réduire de moitié: This card reduces the thinking time of the next players by half for 1 turn.
POWERS.Cette carte permet d'échanger une lettre: This card allows you to exchange a letter from your stand for a letter of your choice from the bag of letters.
POWERS.Cette carte permet d'échanger votre chev: This card allows you to exchange your stand with that of one of your opponents.
POWERS.Cette carte permet de retirer des points: This card removes points from the opponent who has the most points and redistributes them to all the other players.
POWERS.Cette carte permet d'ajouter 1 minute à: This card adds 1 minute to your thinking time.
POWERS.Cette carte permet de retirer une carte: This card removes a power card from all enemy players.
